type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:restrict_armor`
Restricts the entity that has the power from equipping items as armor (via right-click, dispensing or by dragging and dropping the item in the equipment slot(s)) in the specified equipment slot(s).
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

head.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the head equipment slot.

chest.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the chest equipment slot.

legs.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the legs equipment slot.

feet.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the feet equipment slot.
